titleStmt.title: To His Grace His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable the Estates of Parliament. The humble petition of the Council-General of the Company of Scotland trading to Africa and the Indies
titleStmt.author: Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies.

notesStmt.note: "Signed at Edinburgh the 22 day of June 1698. ... By Basil Hamilton, I.P.C.G.".
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
